control_attributes.Control: SA-19 (2) CONFIGURATION CONTROL FOR COMPONENT SERVICE / REPAIR
control_attributes.control_description: The organization maintains configuration control over [Assignment: organization-defined information system components] awaiting service/repair and serviced/repaired components awaiting return to service.

Control Statement: The organization maintains configuration control over [Assignment: organization-defined information system components] awaiting service/repair and serviced/repaired components awaiting return to service.
Control Name: SA-19 (2) CONFIGURATION CONTROL FOR COMPONENT SERVICE / REPAIR
